laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial CK levels were 26,372 IU/L; subsequent levels showed a decrease from 28,457 IU/L to 21,671 IU/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: CK levels persisted above 20,000 IU/L despite cessation of sports.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Muscle biopsy from the right quadriceps showed necrosis, endomysial and perivascular lymphocytic infiltrates, with no fibrosis or fatty infiltration.
Initially normal; later revealed a myopathic pattern.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial tests were normal; a new EMG showed a myopathic pattern.
